QuestData.Title: Fallen Idols
QuestData.Description:
De blood trolls seek to weaken Krag'wa and take his power. Dey steal his idols of power to crack open and feed their magic.
Salvage what idols you can. Dey will be needed to make Krag'wa strong. Strong enough to fight dem off once and for all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Stolen Idols of Krag'wa from the blood troll camp in the Frogmarsh.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Krag'wa within his burrow.
